Description:
Detects scheduled task creations or modification to be run with high privileges on a suspicious schedule type

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Schtasks Schedule Type With High Privileges
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '% onlogon %' or command like '% onstart %' or command like '% once %' or command like '% onidle %') and (command like '%nt aut%' or command like '% system%' or command like '%highest%') and (process_path like '%\schtasks.exe' and original_file_name = 'schtasks.exe'))
